fields.name: Somethings wrong...
fields.effect: Each player increases Despair by one each turn

fields.name: Shivering Survivor
fields.success: On success by 10 or greater, draw a survivor

fields.name: Tickler
fields.effect: Add a counter. On three counters, add a Level 1 Hostile to the deck.

fields.name: Hobgoblin
fields.effect: Add a counter. On three counters, add a Level 1 Hostile to the deck.

fields.name: Screecher
fields.effect: Cannot be killed by an unassisted survivor
